entry.title: Buck meets the parents
entry.summary:
Author: Ficalicious

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,067Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 0

Summary: Abuela pulled back, eyes narrowing slightly, brows furrowing as her eyes flicked between him and Eddie. “Edmundo, have you talked to your parents?” which had Eddie wincing.“No, no not yet.” Eddie admitted, “It- I know I should have but-““But my foolish son and his wife are estupido?”“Si Abuela.” Eddie nodded, “That about sums it up.”“It won’t be a good idea to tell them at the party mijo.” That came from Tia Pepa, an understanding but concerned look on her face. “You need to try and speak to them before the party. Neither of you should have to deal with that.““We won’t.” Buck piped up, “Don’t worry. I already told Eddie I know he’s not ready to talk to them about his sexuality yet and he’s not ready to come out so we’ll just pretend that we’re friends and Eddie moved in with me for practical reasons. We’ll talk to Rina and Chris- maybe convince Chris that it’s a game or something.”...Abuela's birthday is coming up and the Diaz parents are coming to town. Featuring secret relationships and adorable Buddie with a protective Buck who hates his boyfriends parents.
